name: PD Sensor Array
desc:
Specialist tracking systems that allow for more precise targeting of fighters, as well as granting a small increase to weapons range.

Damage to fighters is increased by %s and range of all weapons is increased by %s.
short: Increased damage to fighters; Increased weapon range.

name: Rapid Forged Missiles
desc: The missiles fired by this vessel are rapidly forged, and as such suffer from %s reduced damage, and %s reduced hitpoints.
